circumstances: While descending to Hot Springs-Ingalls Field Airport, the crew encountered poor weather conditions with low ceiling, rain falls and fog. The twin engine airplane passed below the decision height when it struck trees and crashed. All six occupants were rescued and the aircraft was destroyed.
probable_cause:
Collision with trees on final approach due to improper IFR operation. The following contributing factors were reported:
- Low ceiling, 
- Rain,
- Fog,
- Descended below decision height.
